name: IT Man
description:
A platformer where you use hooks in the form of IT-supplies to move around.

Make your way to the peak of the mountain using your IT-skills.§

Keyboard and mouse:

Mouse to aim.

Mouse buttons to fire your hooks, hold to throw further.

Q and E to reel in the hooks.

Xbox controller:

Right stick to aim.

Triggers to fire your hooks.

Bumbers to reel in your hooks
